title: The Texas-Mexico Border and Colonias
prompt: Overhead view of a modest kitchen table in a colonia home at golden hour, with hands of multiple generations visible sorting through medical documents and bills, a glass of water catching warm light, the texture of worn wood and faded linoleum visible, late afternoon sun streaming through a window casting long shadows, documentary-style capture emphasizing the weight of everyday decisions made in spaces without full infrastructure, the photograph composed to suggest connection across an unseen boundary rather than division.
